segments.text: What does this have to do with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know all about coffee . I need your advice , so I won't look stupid when I order .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Order tea . Isn't that what you like to drink ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come on , Hugh ! Tea is for wimps ! Please , I need your help .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you want to be macho , order a double shot of espresso .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now you're talking . That sounds good . What is it ?
segments.speaker: S2
